articles.title: Biden unveils $1.9 trillion plan to stem Covid-19 and steady economy
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden unveiled a $1.9 trillion stimulus package proposal to jump-start the economy and speed up the response to the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: WhatsApp clarifies privacy policy update, says it won't delete accounts
articles.description: WhatsApp clarified that it won't delete accounts of users who don't accept its new privacy policy, but will continue to send reminders to do so.

articles.title: Elon Musk becomes the richest person in the world, passing Jeff Bezos
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk became the world's richest person, surpassing Amazon founder Jeff Bezos with a net worth of over $185 billion.
